sentences: Agnes Monica Muljoto (born 1 July 1986), known professionally as Agnez Mo (stylized as all caps), is an Indonesian Diva, singer, songwriter, music producer, actress, dancer, model, and businesswoman.

sentences: Agnes Monica Muljoto was born in Jakarta, Indonesia, to a family of German, Japanese and Chinese ancestry.

sentences: She is the youngest child of Jenny Siswono, a former table tennis player, and Ricky Muljoto, a former basketball player.
section: == Life and career == | === Childhood and early career ===

sentences: Her elder brother, Steve Muljoto, is her manager.
section: == Life and career == | === Childhood and early career ===

sentences: She attended Tarakanita elementary school and Pelita Harapan Junior and Senior High school in Jakarta.
section: == Life and career == | === Childhood and early career ===

sentences: She has shown her talent in the performing arts since childhood, especially in singing.
section: == Life and career == | === Childhood and early career ===

sentences: She sang in church and was also sent to vocal courses.
section: == Life and career == | === Childhood and early career ===

sentences: Using "Agnes Monica" as her stage name, Agnes entered the entertainment industry in 1992 with her first children's album, Si Meong.
section: == Life and career == | === Childhood and early career ===

sentences: In 1995, she released her second children's album, Yess!, which includes a duet with fellow Indonesian child singer, Eza Yayang.
section: == Life and career == | === Childhood and early career ===

sentences: Her last children's album, Bala-Bala, was released the following year.
section: == Life and career == | === Childhood and early career ===

sentences: She also became the host for several children's programs, including Video Anak Anteve (VAN) on ANTV, Tralala-Trilili on RCTI, and Diva Romeo on Trans TV.
section: == Life and career == | === Childhood and early career ===

sentences: She was awarded "Most Favorite Presenter of Children's Program" at the Panasonic Awards in 1999 and 2000 for Tralala-Trilili.
section: == Life and career == | === Childhood and early career ===

sentences: Agnes began acting when she was 13 years old.
section: == Life and career == | === Childhood and early career ===

sentences: Her first two roles were on the soap operas Lupus Millenia and Mr. Hologram in 1999.

sentences: The next year, she starred in the TV series, Pernikahan Dini, which served as a turning point in her career by transforming her image from that of a child artist to one of a teenage artist.

== Artistry ==

sentences: Artistry ==
section: == Artistry ==

sentences: Mo has been noted as a powerful soprano with a vocal range spanning 5 octaves (B2 - D6 - Bb6 - C#8).
section: == Artistry ==

sentences: Her songs can be classified as pop.
section: == Artistry ==

sentences: She has stated that Aretha Franklin, Madonna, Michael Jackson, Fantasia, Brandy Norwood, Lauryn Hill, Mariah Carey, Christina Aguilera, Beyoncé and Lady Gaga have influenced her music.
section: == Artistry ==

sentences: In addition to her singing skills, Mo is also known as excellent dancer and actress.
section: == Artistry ==

sentences: She is the only Indonesian soloist with a personal dance group, known as Nezindahood.
section: == Artistry ==

sentences: They auditioned during the development of her first album in 2003.
section: == Artistry ==

sentences: She has also written some of her songs and produced her own music videos.
section: == Artistry ==

sentences: She has been described as a perfectionist with a variety of talents by music critics.
section: == Artistry ==

sentences: Throughout her career, Mo has often been deemed controversial in Indonesia.
section: == Artistry ==

sentences: When she was a teenager, her frequent comments about her goal to break into the international market was viewed by some as a pompous proclamation.

sentences: In 2010, however, she began working on a debut English studio album.

== Honors and awards ==

sentences: Honors and awards ==
section: == Honors and awards ==

sentences: Mo has become the most-awarded Indonesian singer.
section: == Honors and awards ==

sentences: Notable awards she has won included: 18 Anugerah Musik Indonesia, 8 Panasonic Awards, 5 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards, and 4 MTV Indonesia Awards.
section: == Honors and awards ==

sentences: She has also received many international awards, including 1 Anugerah Planet Muzik, 3 Asia Song Festival, 7 JPopAsia Music Awards, 2 Mnet Asian Music Awards, 1 Shorty Awards, 3 Social Star Awards, 1 World Music Awards, and 1 iHeartRadio Music Awards.
section: == Honors and awards ==

sentences: For her contribution and support to Indonesian music, Mo was honored the 2011 Nugraha Bhakti Musik Indonesia (NBMI) award from The Minister of Culture and Tourism, and Association of Indonesian Singers, Songwriters And Music Record Producers.
